name: VectorIndexer
description: Vector Indexer indexes categorical features inside of a Vector. It decides which features are categorical and converts them to category indices. The decision is based on the number of distinct values of a feature.

fields.name: maxCategories
fields.title: Maximum Categories
fields.description: Threshold for the number of values a categorical feature can take. If a feature is found to have > maxCategories values, then it is declared continuous. Must be >= 2
